articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued stamps (one individual stamp and one sheet) showing the newly-built terminal of Pyongyang International Airport and remodeled Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					 The individual stamp carries the logo of the Pyongyang International Airport.
					
					 Seen on the upper part of the sheet are the logo of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the badge of the Korean Children's Union and letters "Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace" written in Korean and English.
					
					 Portrayed in the center of the sheet is a panoramic view of the palace and in its lower part are the science hall, lobby and dormitory of the palace.
					
					 The terminal of the Pyongyang International Airport and the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace were built and remodeled into monumental edifices in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea last year under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, the bureau published four individual stamps carrying photos of birds inhabiting the DPRK and other countries.

articles.title: Production of Geothermal Equipment Put on Specialized Basis
articles.content:
Production of Geothermal Equipment Put on Specialized Basis
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A geothermal equipment production base was built at the Ryongsong Machine Complex in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 The base has a general assembly shop, test site, combined control room and shipment area.
					
					 When visiting the complex in October Juche 100 (2011), leader Kim Jong Il appreciated the newly-manufactured geothermal equipment and set forth the task to build a base for producing geothermal equipment.
					
					 The completion of the base would be conducive to equipping public buildings, hydroponic greenhouses and dwelling houses with air-conditioning system.

articles.title: Solar-powered Bus Manufactured in DPRK
articles.content:
Solar-powered Bus Manufactured in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians in Nampho City of the DPRK developed a solar-powered bus which can carry more than 80 passengers.
					 The development of this bus helps reduce noise pollution and relieve the strain on transport in the city.
					
					 According to Jong In Song, an official of the Nampho City Science and Technology Commission, the bus based on a solar battery has tens of solar panels on the top of it. 
					
					 Full charge is enough for the bus to run 50~80 kms.
					
					 It needs 200V for 30km/h, 300V for 45km/h and 600V for 80-120km/h.
					
					 And a research is going on to extend its running distance.

articles.title: New Nanotechnologies for Farming Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Nanotechnologies for Farming Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Different nanotechnologies for farming have recently been developed in the DPRK.
					 The Agricultural Nano Technology Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science established processes for producing nano-metallic oxides, nano-nonmetallic oxides and nano-organic matters on the basis of supercritical fluid technology.
					
					 The institute developed 40-odd kinds of nano-materials for over 10 years and manufactured nanotechnology products.
					
					 Nano-germicide and nano-photosynthetic accelerant have been applied to farming, proving highly effective. In particular, the effectiveness of nano-germicide reaches at 85-90 percent.
					
					 The institute also succeeded in making nano-silicon fertilizer and nano-functional film.

articles.title: Great National Unity Is Powerful Weapon for Achieving National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Great National Unity Is Powerful Weapon for Achieving National Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- When all Koreans carry on the struggle by their joint efforts in response to the appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations, the broad avenue to national reunification will surely open, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					It goes on:
					
					To achieve the great national unity is the main way of solving the issue of national reunification in the interests common to the nation.
					
					Nothing is more important than achieving the great national unity in hastening national reunification.
					
					The great national unity serves as the main motive force for bolstering up the driving force of national reunification in every way, repelling all challenges and obstructions of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and achieving the victory of national reunification.
					
					History clearly proves that the great national unity is the only road of justice and true patriotism for all Koreans who have lived separated for a long time to reunify the country, prosper and demonstrate the nation's dignity and honor.
					
					It is high time that all Koreans demonstrated their wisdom and united efforts.
					
					Those who do not support the great national unity can not be called Koreans. 
					
					Compatriots from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad should swim with the trend of the great national unity in single mind and with patriotic intention for reunification as a member of the Korean nation wherever they might live.
					
					No matter how wild the wind of confrontation and antagonism may be, it can never quench the hot wind of patriotism for reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy recently roving round different countries under the support of and at the instigation of the U.S., while soliciting for "cooperation in pressurizing the north" only to prove futile.
					 On the contrary, the neighboring countries of the Korean peninsula are putting the south Korean authorities through the hoop.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are finding themselves in an awkward situation as the majority of the UN member states did not submit reports on the implementation of the "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a natural consequence the puppet ruling forces met for their imprudence.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are busy seeking "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" in a bid to isolate and stifle the DPRK, being backed by outsiders but they faced only derision, condemnation and criticism by the public at home and abroad.
					
					 In fact, the solicitation for "pressurizing the DPRK through sanctions" made by the south Korean authorities while terming its self-defensive nuclear deterrent a "threat" is no more than a foolish behavior of colonial stooges keen on realizing their ambition for invading the north by parroting the brigandish paradox of their American master.
					
					 Their desperate bid for the "diplomacy for pressurizing the north to dismantle its nukes" would only bring to light their despicable true colors as traitors devoid of even an iota of national self-respect.
					
					 They had better stop such "diplomacy" and act with discretion.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes Korean American Bae Jun Ho's False Propaganda
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes Korean American Bae Jun Ho's False Propaganda
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Korean American Bae Jun Ho (Kenneth Bae) is now cursed and censured by public for renewing his false propaganda about the DPRK.
					 As already reported, Bae was arrested in the DPRK for spreading subversive religion and working hard to build "a religious state" hostile to the DPRK. For his hostile activities he was sentenced to hard labor. But thanks to the humanitarian measure taken by the DPRK out of magnanimity and good faith he was deported to the U.S. after spending nearly two years in jail. 
					
					 People say that habit is a second nature. Bae is accustomed to hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 Recently Bae released an anti-DPRK book peppered with "stories" about what happened during his hard labor.
					
					 At a book releasing ceremony sponsored by the south Korean puppet forces, Bae talked rubbish that "he is planning to set up a non-governmental organization for the fellow countrymen in the north and carry out projects helpful to the poor people in the north and defectors from the north." It is ridiculous, indeed, for Bae to be busy with the moves for establishing a non-governmental organization for some people as if he were a big philanthropist. In other words, he revealed his intention to persist in his hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 At a meet-the press with U.S. congressmen he unhesitatingly spouted sheer sophism that he witnessed how could a country be a huge prison and that north Korea is a "huge prison."
					
					 It is less than two years since he begged for sparing his dirty life in tears. He is now in such poor position as to appear as a member of a shock brigade in slandering the DPRK, clinging to the coattails of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 It is worth recalling what he wrote in the letter of apology and letter of thanks done in hot tears before being deported to the U.S. 
					
					 The following is what he wrote in his letter of apology and letter of thanks: "I sincerely thank the DPRK government for all humanitarian measures and treatment for me. I will always remain thankful to the Korean people and the DPRK and take the lead in the work for national reunification and prosperity, never forgetting benevolence bestowed upon me. I will make efforts to play the role of a bridge of friendship linking the Western world with the DPRK."
					
					 In fact, the DPRK provided everything to Bae during his prison life from humanitarian point of view. Whenever he did not feel well, we took him to a hospital to be treated several times. We arranged his meeting with his mother and let him exchange hundreds of correspondences.
					
					 There is a saying one's kindness should be repaid. However, Bae returns evil for good. He has not built a bridge of friendship but erected a bridge of distrust and confrontation. Is it morally right?
					
					 Bae is the felon who betrayed not only human conscience but also religious devotion.
					
					 Before flying to the U.S., he told officials concerned of the DPRK that he is the churchman saying truth and religionist's devotion to God is sacred and he can never betray it.
					
					 But upon returning to the U.S., he made a U turn, going busy hatching plots with the group of Satan falsifying facts. He is none other than Judas. 
					
					 Bae Jun Ho has no option but to commit suicide.
					
					 We have nothing to say more of Bae waiting for the day of death after   being branded as a despicable bete noire.
					
					 What matters is the double-dealing nature of the U.S. government as it promised to prevent the recurrence of such behavior while conducting "rescuing operation" of American criminals under the signboard of "humanitarianism" but it gives a shot in the arm of those guys as soon as its representatives went back.
					
					 It is the American society where different anti-DPRK organizations are strutting about, prodding such human scum and half wits as Bae Jun Ho into taking the lead in the false propaganda to mislead public opinion.
					
					  It is a hard fact that the U.S. government is behind these organizations. 
					
					 It is the true picture of the American society where there is profound confusing of right and wrong, injustice beats justice and human rights are wantonly abused. 
					
					 The U.S. government should bear in mind that if it resorts to the anti-DPRK propaganda under the signboard of "human rights", the fate of the U.S. citizens now serving jail terms in the DPRK will become more miserable.
					
					 The DPRK will neither make any compromise nor conduct negotiations with the U.S. over the issue of American criminals nor take any humanitarian measure as long as Bae Jun Ho keeps spouting invectives against the DPRK.
					
					 Then American criminals now in custody in the DPRK will never be able to go back to the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's clarification of this stand is not just a warning.

articles.title: Major Variable of Situation on Korean Peninsula Depends on U.S.: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Major Variable of Situation on Korean Peninsula Depends on U.S.: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi entered Pusan Port of south Korea on June 13.
					 The U.S. undisguised preparations in its mainland for the "operation of precision air strike" at the DPRK's nuclear facilities and nuclear force are timed to coincide with the introduction of two U.S. nuclear aircraft carriers in the waters of Asia-Pacific near the Korean peninsula. This pushes the already instable situation on the peninsula to more uncontrollable phase.
					
					 The input of various U.S. strategic assets into the peninsula is a grave challenge to the security of the DPRK and peace of the region.
					
					 Peaceful circumstances are more precious than anything else for the DPRK as it makes a general offensive to attain a high goal of building a socialist power.
					
					 But the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves pursuant to it aimed to stifle the DPRK politically and militarily and isolate its economy  have now reached a grave phase that can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 Despite such situation the U.S. politicaldom including White House is making such rubbish that "the change of the U.S. administration's DPRK policy depends on the change of north Korea".
					
					 How can tension be defused and stability ensured on the Korean peninsula by unilateral efforts of the one side when the U.S. keeps introducing strategic means?
					
					 The U.S. made very hasty and strategically wrong decision this time, too.
					
					 The evil cycle of tensions persisting in the Korean peninsula is entirely attributable to the U.S. perverted view.
					
					 The U.S. has refused to recognize the ideology and social system in the DPRK and posed unrelenting nuclear threats to it after designating it as a target of preemptive nuclear strike. To resolutely counter it is a clear exercise of the DPRK's right to self-defence to protect the security and peace of the country.
					
					 Peace, most valuable for the country and nation, can be protected and guaranteed only when one's own strength is built up and one's own efforts are exerted. This is the truth taught by the present grave situation.
					
					 The DPRK is ready both for dialogue and physical step.
					
					 The major variable of the situation on the Korean peninsula depends on what attitude the U.S. will take.

articles.title: S. Korean Mayor Denounces Puppet Authorities for Seeking to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
S. Korean Mayor Denounces Puppet Authorities for Seeking to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Ri Jae Myong, mayor of Songnam City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, posted on his website an article accusing traitor Park Geun Hye of trying to revive the era of "yusin" dictatorship, according to the south Korean newspaper Kukmin Ilbo.
					 The article said that the economic life of the citizens in his city is in the lowest ebb due to Park Geun Hye's collection of taxes from them.
					
					 It deplored the situation in which most of the local self-governing bodies can not exist on its own owing to the "government's" plunder.
					
					 It stressed the need to fight against the "government's" moves for reviving the "yusin" dictatorship and win democracy.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Party Floor Leader Criticizes Regime's Inefficiency
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Party Floor Leader Criticizes Regime's Inefficiency
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The floor leader of the opposition Minju Party of south Korea said at the "National Assembly" on June 17 that the regime has lost its function.
					 The regime was faced with many issues pending a correct solution as regards economic recession but solved none of them, he deplored, and went on:
					
					 Despite the economic recession the regime remains inefficient and the ruling party is only engrossed in the row.
					
					 Now is the time for the present chief executive to figure out a substantial solution to bettering the people's livelihood.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Misrule
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Misrule
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is being censured by the world public for its misrule against human rights, according to an editorial posted on the south Korean on-line newspaper Voice of People on June 18.
					 The editorial recalled that a report was published by the UN Human Rights Council on June 17 disclosing the regime's human rights abuses.
					
					 It is deplorable that the human rights situation in south Korea is arousing concern of the international community, the editorial noted.
					
					 Far from reflecting on its wrongdoings, the regime is busy putting up lame excuses peppered with lies, the editorial charged.
					
					 Referring to the UN special rapporteur's assertion that the south Korea-Japan "agreement" on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army failed to take into consideration the recommendations from the UN human rights  organization, it said all facts prove that the Park Geun Hye's regime is going against democratization of south Korean society.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by German Organization
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by German Organization
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Full texts of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "National Reunification Must Be Realized Independently by the Concerted Efforts of Our Nation Itself" were posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on June 15, the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Kim Il Sung's work published on Aug. 18, Juche 79 (1990) clarifies the ways for realizing national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work published on June 30, Juche 89 (2000) clarifies that the issue of Korea's reunification is an internal affair of the nation and the greatest task of the Korean nation and that the Korean nation should become the driving force of reunification to resolve it by its own efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Bangladesh, Indonesia and Mexico on June 10 and 14 to mark the 52nd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Present at the seminars were public figures and masses of those countries.
					
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Party of Bangladesh and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into the great party of President Kim Il Sung and victoriously advancing the Juche-oriented socialist cause.
					
					The chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other speakers enumerated how Kim Jong Il formulated the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung, as Kimilsungism, built the WPK into an iron-willed invincible party and a mother party that has formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses, and resolutely frustrated the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country with his invincible Songun politics.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in Finland, Algeria, Nigeria and South Africa between June 14 and 19 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and photos and books introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean films "Flag of Workers' Party of Korea", "International Friendship Exhibition House" and "Mirae Scientists Street" were shown at the film shows.
					
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK 52 years  ago was a special event in the struggle of the Korean people to strengthen the party and build socialism.
					
					 They praised Kim Jong Il as the distinguished leader and the benevolent father of the people who devoted himself to the happiness of the Korean people and the reunification of the country.
					
					 Nigerian Senator Abudulah Adamu and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into the mother party which takes care of the destiny of the popular masses in a responsible manner.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Leader of Bangladeshi Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Leader of Bangladeshi Political Party
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, issued a statement on June 15 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 We, together with the progressive people, are greeting in boundless reverence June 19 when the great HE Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK 52 years ago.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding and tested leadership, the WPK has strengthened into the invincible party that has achieved single-minded unity and the DPRK turned into a politico-ideological power and a military power despite all difficulties and ordeals.
					
					 The progressive people pay the highest tribute to him who provided a sure guarantee for the victory of the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Russian Body Supports DPRK's Measures for Protecting Nation's Dignity and Sovereignty
articles.content:
Russian Body Supports DPRK's Measures for Protecting Nation's Dignity and Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK positively supports all measures taken by the DPRK including the ones for bolstering up its nuclear force for self-defense to protect the nation's dignity and sovereignty.
					 The group said this in a statement on June 14.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 When the DPRK, a sovereign state in the East under the harsh sanctions of the West, was waging a new peaceful drive for creating things conducive to the happiness of the people, the south Korean conservative group at the instigation of the U.S. took issue with the DPRK over its nuclear issue once again.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group should clearly understand why the DPRK had to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK was forced to have access to them to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. is staging large-scale military exercises on the Korean peninsula every year.
					
					 It is taking issue with the DPRK over its nuclear test and satellite launch in a bid to justify its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The extremely dangerous situation is being created by the U.S., not by the DPRK.
					
					 The United Nations fails to protect the peace and security of the sovereign states.
					
					 The UN no longer provides a guarantee for peace and security on the earth but has just become a tool serving the U.S.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Nepal, Guinea
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Nepal, Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a lecture took place in Nepal and Guinea on June 10 and 15 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Present at the events were personages of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and the Guinean Guyco Company and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and other speakers said that the north-south summit was provided in Pyongyang in June 2000 for the first time in the history of Korea's division and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration was adopted thanks to leader Kim Jong Il's idea of loving the country, the nation and the people.
					
					 The joint declaration which promised to reunify the country by the efforts of the Korean nation free from outsiders' interference in the idea of By the Korean Nation Itself is the immortal great programme for achieving the independent reunification of Korea, they noted.
					
					 Extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country in the spirit of the joint declaration, they strongly demanded the south Korean puppet authorities respect the joint declaration and thoroughly implement it.
					
					 The chief in charge of the field security of the Guinean Guyco Company in a lecture titled "Opening new era of independent reunification" said that Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, opening an era of By the Korean Nation Itself, a new era of independent reunification.
					
					 He accused the south Korean puppet group of totally denying the joint declaration and resorting to a foolish move to realize the "unification by absorption" with the backing of foreign forces. He urged the south Korean authorities to respect the unanimous will of the whole Korean nation to reunify the country in the spirit of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Chief of Regional Body Favors Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
articles.content:
Chief of Regional Body Favors Korean People's Cause of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- Helmi El Hadidi, chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, issued a statement on June 14 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il provided the north-south summit in June, 2000 and made sure that the historic north-south joint declaration the core of which is By the Korean Nation Itself was adopted and published.
					
					 The publication of the joint declaration was a special event which provided a historic landmark for independent reunification on the Korean peninsula and opened an epochal phase of Korea's reunification.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, said in his report on the review of the work of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea made at its Seventh Congress that great national unity precisely means the reunification of the country.
					
					 We extend invariable support and encouragement to the just cause of the Korean people for the reunification of the country, hoping that Korea would be reunified peacefully on the principle of great national unity.

articles.title: Indonesian Political Party Condemns S. Korean Puppet Forces' Allurement and Abduction of DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Indonesian Political Party Condemns S. Korean Puppet Forces' Allurement and Abduction of DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- The National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia issued a statement on June 15 to  denounce the south Korean puppet gangsters for alluring and abducting DPRK citizens to south Korea.
					 The south Korean authorities obsessed with the anti-DPRK smear campaign unhesitatingly allured and abducted DPRK citizens and are turning away from the elementary demand of the families of the victims to meet their daughters, the statement charged, adding:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are keeping the victims away from contact with outside and making desperate efforts to convince the public that they "defected from the north according to their free will" with all appeasements and blackmails.
					
					 We strongly denounce the south Korean authorities' heinous allurement and abduction of DPRK citizens as a wanton encroachment upon the dignity of the DPRK and unethical crime violating the World Declaration of Human Rights and the International Convention on Human Rights.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities unconditionally and immediately send back the abductees of the DPRK and punish those involved in the abduction at once.
					
					 We appeal to the international human rights bodies to call into question the south Korean authorities' allurement and abduction and take measures to send back DPRK citizens to their country at an early date.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Devoting Oneself to National Reunification Is the Most Genuine Patriotism" was published in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House in Russia on June 13 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the publication of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 83 (1994), says the country's reunification is the strong desire of the whole nation and that it is a noble manifestation of love for the country and nation to devote oneself to the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Cuadros visitan museo de historia revolucionaria de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Cuadros visitan museo de historia revolucionaria de Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 52o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion del CC del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang y los funcionarios del CC del PTC visitaron el dia 19 el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					Los visitantes rindieron homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguido en este plantel docente.
					
					Recorrieron varios puntos del museo donde se demuestra que los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu realizaron imborrables hazanas en la Universidad durante todo el curso de su direccion sobre la revolucion y la convirtieron en la fidedigna base de formacion de cuadros nacionales y centro supremo de la educacion jucheana.

articles.title: Premier recorre fabricas y empresas de la ciudad de Hamhung
articles.content:
Premier recorre fabricas y empresas de la ciudad de Hamhung
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de las importantes fabricas y empresas en la ciudad de Hamhung.
					En los Complejos de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, de Fertilizantes de Hungnam y de Maquinaria de Ryongsong y en la Fabrica de Electrodo de Hungnam, el se cercioro de los detalles de produccion y suministro de materiales.
					
					En las unidades respectivas tuvieron lugar las reuniones de consulta de los funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					En las ocasiones se dio enfasis en glorificar con el aumento de produccion las hazanas de direccion de los grandes Hombres registradas en las unidades, al incrementar la produccion, con fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos propios, de abono del ano de fertilizacion y de equipos encargados y articulos quimicos de diversas variedades y sobrecumplir por indices el plan de economia nacional del primer ano de la estrategia quinquenal del desarrollo de la economia estatal.
					
					Se han debatido las medidas para el esmerado cuidado tecnico de los equipos, el suministro suficiente de materias primas y materiales y el aumento de uso de materiales domesticos en la ampliacion de capacidad productiva y reparacion de instalaciones.
					
					Con anterioridad, Pak Pong Ju recorrio la Fabrica de Kimchi Ryugyong.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta rumor de "terrorismo cibernetico del Norte"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta rumor de "terrorismo cibernetico del Norte"
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, la policia surcoreana insistio en "fortalecer la seguridad publica y buscar las medidas contra el terrorismo cibernetico del Norte" mintiendo como si el Norte de Corea hubiera cometido un hacking sobre los datos de industria belica que poseia una empresa civil surcoreana. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual publicado el dia 19, lo califica de nueva farsa provocativa para estigmatizar a la RPDC de "terrorista cibernetica" e intensificar bajo este pretexto la campana de confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Cada vez que ocurria un incidente de hacking, los titeres surcoreanos tildaban de culpable a la RPDC sin motivos justos, pero al final tuvieron que pasar tremenda pena al revelarse la verdad. 
					
					Sin embargo, ellos repiten tal acusacion con el siniestro intento de calumniar a la RPDC y aumentar el clima hostil a esta parte connacional abusando de la inquietud de la poblacion por el terrorismo y de desestimar la creciente demanda del interior y exterior sobre el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Ellos mismos recurren sin escrupulos al terrorismo cibernetico para asegurar y mantener el poder. Pues, es natural que en toda la sociedad surcoreana se reportaran a cualquier hora los casos de terrorismo cibernetico de diferentes dimensiones. 
					
					Por eso, se vieron en la necesidad de acusar al Norte para esquivar las criticas al Sur de Corea, antro de "terrorismo cibernetico" de talla mundial. 
					
					Pero, nadie se dejara enganar por el rumor de " terrorismo cibernetico del Norte" que difunden a toda voz los titeres surcoreanos.

articles.title: ACNC califica de Judas a KENNETH BAE
articles.content:
ACNC califica de Judas a KENNETH BAE
Pyongyang, 20 de junio (ACNC) -- KENNETH BAE se dedica a la vil propaganda anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, razon por la cual es el objeto del repudio y condena del mundo.
					Como saben todos, el fue detenido al cabo de divulgar la religion e intentar establecer un "Estado religioso" en la RPDC y llevo una vida de trabajo reeducativo de casi de dos anos. Gracias a nuestras medidas humanitarias, el fue excarcelado y expulsado a los Estados Unidos.
					
					Hace poco, el dio a luz un libro intrigante anti-RPDC coleccionando los "hechos" experimentados durante su vida de trabajo reeducativo.
					
					En la "charla conmemorativa" de la publicacion del dicho libro, organizada por los titeres surcoreanos, el dijo que "esta planificando la organizacion de un organismo no gubernamental para los compatriotas norcoreanos con el objeto de ayudar a los estratos pobres del Norte de Corea y otros habitantes refugiados del Norte de Corea".
					
					Sus palabras absurdas muestran su intencion de seguir recurriendo a los actos hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					En una entrevista de prensa con parlamentarios norteamericanos peroro sin vacilacion las sofisterias absurdas de que "he visto como se puede convertir un pais en una gran carcel" y agrego que "el Norte es precisamente una carcel grande".
					
					Es tan pobre la situacion de KENNETH BAE, que antes pedia perdon derramando las lagrimas para salvar su vida sucia, pero, ahora se presenta como brigada de choque en la propaganda intrigante anti-RPDC de los Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos soltando unas tonterias.
					
					Antes de ser expulsado a EE.UU., el, muy agradecido por nuestras medidas, escribio con sus manos las cartas de disculpa y de agradecimiento mostrando las lagrimas gruesas.
					
					En sus cartas, escribio que "Doy el agradecimiento sincero al gobierno de la RPDC por sus medidas humanitarias y el tratamiento humano, dispensados en el pasado", "En el futuro dare siempre agradecimiento al pueblo coreano y la RPDC y me pondre al frente de los trabajos por la reunificacion de la patria y la prosperidad nacional, inolvidando durante toda mi vida las benevolencias dispensadas a mi" y "Me esforzara por desempenar un papel del puente de amistad que enlaza el mundo occidental con la RPDC".
					
					En efecto, cuando el estaba en la carcel, le ofrecimos todas las facilidades desde el punto de vista humanitario. Cuando el sentia molestia, le llevamos al hospital para poder recibir el tratamiento hospitalario en varias ocasiones. Y le permitimos encontrarse con su madre e intercambiar cientos de cartas. 
					
					Sin embargo, KENNETH BAE fomenta solo la desconfianza y la confrontacion, lejos de hacer esfuerzos por la amistad. 
					
					Este tipejo abandono no solo la conciencia humana sino tambien la devocion. 
					
					Antes de partir a EE.UU., el dijo a los funcionarios coreanos que el mismo era un clerigo que dice lo que veia con sus propios ojos, era sagrada la devocion de un religioso al Dios, por tanto no podia traicionarla. 
					
					Pero, ahora se adhiere a la horda de satanicos que tergiversan la verdad. Pues, es semejante a Judas que traiciono a Jesus Cristo a precio de 30 monedas de plata. 
					
					Al igual que este traidor, KENNETH BAE no tiene otro remedio mas que suicidarse.
					
					Lo mas problematico es la naturaleza hipocrita del gobierno norteamericano que vociferando publicamente sobre el "humanitarismo" escenifica la farsa de "rescate" a los criminales de su pais y compromete evitar su reproduccion, pero, de hecho instiga y tolera ilicitamente a tales chusmas. 
					
					Es la realidad de la sociedad norteamericana el que diferentes entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC andan con petulancia para desviar las opiniones publicas al presentar a KENNETH BAE y otras escorias humanas como instrumento de la demagogia intrigante. 
					
					Precisamente, el gobierno norteamericano esta controlando en la trasera a tales entidades de conspiracion. 
					
					Es el verdadero aspecto de la sociedad norteamericana la escena caotica donde la verdad se convierte en falso, la injusticia reprime a la justicia y se pisotean flagrantemente los verdaderos DDHH. 
					
					Es pesima la demagogia intrigante que se comete contra la RPDC movilizandose la autoridad gubernamental, juridica y civil. 
					
					En el caso de que siga recurriendo a la campana intrigante anti-RPDC bajo el vistoso rotulo de DDHH, el gobierno norteamericano debe saber correctamente que sera mas miserable el destino de los ciudadanos norteamericanos que estan detenidos en nuestro pais y sometidos en el trabajo reeducativo. 
					
					Mientras que KENNETH BAE siga lanzando tales palabrerias, nunca sostendremos ninguna negociacion y conversacion con Estados Unidos en cuanto al problema de criminales norteamericanos y no habra las medidas humanitarias. 
					
					Entonces, los criminales norteamericanos encarcelados en nuestro pais se hallaran en el estado miserable de no poder pisar por mas tiempo su territorio. 
					
					Tal posicion nuestra no es una advertencia vana.
